tool_description: Extracts and analyzes fare rules, restrictions, and conditions from flight bookings to help understand cancellation policies, change fees, and baggage allowances.

ticket_type.description: Ticket type: economy, premium_economy, business, first

error_messages: Invalid fare code: Provide a valid airline fare class code.
Invalid airline code: Use a valid 2-letter IATA airline code.
Invalid ticket type: Use one of [economy, premium_economy, business, first].
Fare rules not found: No fare rules available for the specified combination.
usage: Provide fare_code and airline_code to extract specific fare rules. Specify ticket_type to get class-specific restrictions and allowances.

change_fee.description: Fee charged for flight changes in USD

refund_type.description: Type of refund available: full, partial, credit_only, non_refundable

seat_selection.description: Seat selection policy: free, fee_based, restricted, not_allowed

advance_purchase_required.description: Minimum days before departure to book

restrictions_summary.description: Summary of key fare restrictions and conditions
